thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Paris Elysees - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very good
thread.title_full: Very good - Review of Holiday Inn Paris Elysees, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: TheBristolJohns
title: Very good
text: It'd been a while since I'd stayed here and I remembered why I liked it. It's in a great location, modern, simply furnished and very clean rooms, pleasant staff and a simple continental breakfast. It's in a very accessible area from a transport perspective. Recommended for both business and leisure, though if you intend to spend a lot of your time in the hotel (why would you with all of Paris to see?) you may want a hotel with larger rooms.
